location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter discusses the Imam of Muscat [Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd]'s second expedition against the Joasemiis [Qawāsim]. William Bruce states that the Imam has the support of the Beni Yass [Bani Yas] tribe, and Sultaun Sugger [Sulṭān bin Saqr Āl Qāsimī]. Includes a copy of a translation of a letter, dated 19 May 1814, from the Imam of Muscat to Bruce.
